channel.title: See Cape Through Body

item.title: See Cape Through Body
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[QUOTE='Spike]model.java replace public model with this

public Model(int modelId) { byte[] is = aClass21Array1661[modelId].aByteArray368; if (is[is.length - 1] == -1 && is[is.length - 2] == -1) read622Model(is, modelId); else readOldModel(modelId); if (newmodel[modelId]) { scale2(4);// 2 is too big -- 3 is almost right if(anIntArray1638 != null) { for(int j = 0; j < anIntArray1638.length; j++) anIntArray1638[j] = 10; } } }[/QUOTE]

Credit goes to 'Spike from Rune-Server.

item.title: See Cape Through Body
item.dc:creator: @FrostScapePi FrostScapePi
item.description:
@FrostScapePi wrote:

can someone tell me why my cape is see through to my body?

case 18703: itemDef.modelid = 51117; itemDef.name = "cyan Cape"; itemDef.modelZoom = 1385; itemDef.modelRotationY = 500; itemDef.modelRotationX = 2000; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.stackable = false; itemDef.value = 1; itemDef.membersObject = true; itemDef.anInt165 = 51118; itemDef.anInt200 = 51118; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Skull"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; itemDef.anInt175 = 14; itemDef.anInt197 = 7; break;
